rawConfiguration.text:
![Logo](https://i.imgur.com/svj3gcA.png)
- - -
# Overview
Linkerd is a service mesh for Kubernetes. It makes running services easier and safer by giving you runtime debugging, observability, reliability, and securityâ€”all without requiring any changes to your code.

For detailed information:
https://linkerd.io/2.12/overview/

About this Dashboard
This dashboard is based on standard Linkerd Prometheus metrics ingested using Prometheus remote write. It provides widgets showing different levels of metrics such as:

Protocol-Level Metrics, including the following labels:
   - Response Labels
   - Outbound labels
   - Prometheus Collector labels

Transport-Level Metrics, including the following lable:
   - Connection Close Labels

Identity Metrics

Find more info about Linkerd metric here:
https://linkerd.io/2.12/features/telemetry/#golden-metrics

https://linkerd.io/2.12/reference/proxy-metrics/

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(process_virtual_memory_bytes) from Metric FACET namespace,pod where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(process_cpu_seconds_total) from Metric FACET namespace,pod where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(process_open_fds) from Metric FACET namespace,pod where job = 'linkerd-proxy' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT filter(count(response_total) , WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND job = 'linkerd-proxy' and instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and response_total IS NOT NULL AND classification = 'success' ) *100 / (FROM Metric SELECT filter(count(request_total) , WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND job = 'linkerd-proxy' and instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and request_total IS NOT NULL) ) as 'Success Rate'
SELECT sum(request_total)/3600 as 'Requests/sec' from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND  instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' FACET pod TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT percentile(response_latency_ms_bucket,95) as 'Latency' from Metric FACET pod TIMESERIES  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'
SELECT latest(go_goroutines) from Metric FACET component where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(process_resident_memory_bytes) from Metric FACET component where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT latest(process_open_fds) from Metric FACET component where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT latest(go_threads) from Metric FACET component where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(http_server_requests_total) from Metric FACET component,method,code where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(http_server_request_latency_seconds_bucket) from Metric FACET le,component,method,code where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(http_server_response_size_bytes_bucket) from Metric FACET le,component,method,code where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(http_client_requests_total) from Metric FACET component,client,method,code where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(http_client_request_latency_seconds_bucket) from Metric FACET le,component,client,method,code where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT sum(http_client_in_flight_requests) from Metric FACET component,client where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(metricName) as 'Metrics'  from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND job like '%linkerd%' and metricName IS NOT NULL   limit MAX FACET instance, job, pod, namespace

SELECT latest(tcp_close_total) from Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'linkerd-destination' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND errno != '' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_open_connections) from  Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'linkerd-destination' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_connection_duration_ms_bucket) FROM Metric FACET namespace WHERE deployment = 'linkerd-destination' AND direction = 'inbound' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='destination' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='destination' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='destination' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component = 'destination'  TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P50 Destination' from Metric  where quantile ='0.5' AND component= 'destination' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P75 Destination' from Metric  where quantile ='0.75' AND component= 'destination' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'MAX Destination' from Metric  where quantile ='1' AND component= 'destination' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_sent_total) AS 'sent/destination' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='destination' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_received_total) AS 'received/destination' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='destination' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_close_total) from Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'linkerd-identity' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND errno != '' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_open_connections) from  Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'linkerd-identity' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_connection_duration_ms_bucket) FROM Metric FACET namespace WHERE deployment = 'linkerd-identity' AND direction = 'inbound' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='identity' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='identity' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='identity' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component = 'identity'  TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P50 Identity' from Metric  where quantile ='0.5' AND component= 'identity' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P75 Identity' from Metric  where quantile ='0.75' AND component= 'identity' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'MAX Identity' from Metric  where quantile ='1' AND component= 'identity' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_sent_total) AS 'sent/identity' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='identity' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_received_total) AS 'received/identity' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='destination' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_close_total) from Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'linkerd-proxy-injector' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND errno != '' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_open_connections) from  Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'linkerd-proxy-injector' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_connection_duration_ms_bucket) FROM Metric FACET namespace WHERE deployment = 'linkerd-proxy-injector' AND direction = 'inbound' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='proxy-injector' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='proxy-injector' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='proxy-injector' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component = 'proxy-injector'  TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P50 proxy-injector' from Metric  where quantile ='0.5' AND component= 'proxy-injector' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P75 proxy-injector' from Metric  where quantile ='0.75' AND component= 'proxy-injector' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'MAX proxy-injector' from Metric  where quantile ='1' AND component= 'proxy-injector' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_sent_total) AS 'sent/proxy-injector' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component = 'proxy-injector' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_received_total) AS 'received/proxy-injector' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='proxy-injector' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_close_total) from Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'metrics-api' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND errno != '' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_open_connections) from  Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'metrics-api' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_connection_duration_ms_bucket) FROM Metric FACET namespace WHERE deployment = 'metrics-api' AND direction = 'inbound' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='metrics-api' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='metrics-api' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='metrics-api' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component = 'metrics-api'  TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P50 Metrics-api' from Metric  where quantile ='0.5' AND component= 'metrics-api' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P75 Metrics-api' from Metric  where quantile ='0.75' AND component= 'metrics-api' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'MAX Metrics-api' from Metric  where quantile ='1' AND component= 'metrics-api' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_sent_total) AS 'sent/metrics-api' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='metrics-api' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_received_total) AS 'received/metrics-api' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='metrics-api' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_close_total) from Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'prometheus' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND errno != '' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_open_connections) from  Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'prometheus' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_connection_duration_ms_bucket) FROM Metric FACET namespace WHERE deployment = 'prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='prometheus' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='prometheus' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_close_total) from Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'tap' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND errno != '' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_open_connections) from  Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'tap' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_connection_duration_ms_bucket) FROM Metric FACET namespace WHERE deployment = 'tap' AND direction = 'inbound' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='tap' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='tap' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='tap' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component = 'tap'  TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_gc_duration_seconds) AS 'P50 tap' from Metric  where quantile ='0.5' AND component= 'tap' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_sent_total) AS 'sent/tap' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='tap' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_received_total) AS 'received/tap' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='tap' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_close_total) from Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'tap-injector' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND errno != '' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_open_connections) from  Metric FACET namespace where deployment = 'tap-injector' AND  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' AND direction = 'inbound' AND namespace LIKE '%linkerd%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(tcp_connection_duration_ms_bucket) FROM Metric FACET namespace WHERE deployment = 'tap-injector' AND direction = 'inbound' AND instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus'  TIMESERIES

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='tap-injector' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total) from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' and component ='tap-injector' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(grpc_server_msg_received_total) AS 'received/web' from Metric  where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND instrumentation.source = 'Linkerd_Prometheus' and job ='linkerd-controller' AND component ='web' TIMESERIES AUTO
